title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 428.3 - Activities undertaken by more than one state agency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 428.3 - Activities undertaken by more than one state agency

State Regulations
(a) If more than one State agency is involved
in an undertaking which is subject to review under this Part, a single
consolidated review will be acceptable, provided that it encompasses all agency
activities associated with the undertaking which are subject to
review. (b) The primary
responsibility for complying with the provisions of this Part is on the agency
initiating the undertaking. However, the involved agencies may agree among
themselves which agency shall act as lead agency for purposes of this

Part. (c) Notwithstanding the
provisions of subdivisions (a) and (b) of this section, every State agency
involved in an undertaking shall be responsible for ensuring that the
provisions of this Part are complied with. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
428.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
